amendment.description: An amendment to strike all after the enacting clause and insert a new text entitled "Nicholas Dockery Medal of Honor Act".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bacon amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Bacon.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bacon amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
